content.main_text: Learn about different food courses and their characteristics.
content.section_1_content: Understanding food courses is essential for proper menu organization and service.
content.section_2_content: Common course types include appetizers, entrees, desserts, and more.
content.section_3_content: Knowing course types helps with menu organization and customer service.

questions.question_text: What food course does {dish_name} belong to?
